@graph.name: Burn
@graph.description: Fire damage over time. All fire damage inflicts Burn.

@graph.name: Bleed
@graph.description: Physical damage over time.

@graph.name: Poison
@graph.description: Poison damage over time. Stacks infinitely.

@graph.name: Necrosis
@graph.description: Necrotic damage over time.

@graph.name: Chill
@graph.description: -20% Movement Speed.

@graph.name: Shock
@graph.description: x1.04 Damage Taken per stack.

@graph.name: Frostbite
@graph.description: x1.25 Cold Damage Taken.

@graph.name: Scorch
@graph.description: x1.25 Fire Damage Taken.

@graph.name: Zap
@graph.description: x1.25 Lightning Damage Taken.

@graph.name: Toxic
@graph.description: x1.25 Poison Damage Taken.

@graph.name: Pyromancy Orb
@graph.description: Grants a flame orbital dealing fire damage and inflicting Burn. Pyromancer starting equipment.

@graph.name: Fire Fang
@graph.description: Ranged fire weapon. Disables non-quiver offhand items.

@graph.name: Firebomb Codex
@graph.description: Spawns a firebomb totem that deals fire damage and inflicts Burn.

@graph.name: Flameberge
@graph.description: Heavy fire sword. All fire damage is elemental and inflicts Burn.

@graph.name: Inferno Orb Wand
@graph.description: Spawns inferno orbs that orbit and deal fire damage.

@graph.name: Ice Fang
@graph.description: Ranged cold weapon. Inflicts Chill on hit.

@graph.name: Frostbite Staff
@graph.description: Magic cold staff. All cold damage inflicts Chill.

@graph.name: Arc Staff
@graph.description: Fires arcs of lightning that chain between enemies.

@graph.name: Pyromancer
@graph.passive: Inner Flame — Gain +20% Tick Speed per Mana Container you have.

@graph.name: Sorcerer
@graph.passive: Elemental Affinity — Gain +20% Effect of Ailments per Mana Container you have.

@graph.name: Wizard
@graph.passive: Wisdom — You gain +1 Mana at level 2, 4 and 6.

@graph.name: Barbarian
@graph.passive: Berserker Strength — Each point of Strength grants more damage to STR-scaling weapons.

@graph.name: Ranger
@graph.passive: Hits deal x1.20 Damage at far range but x0.90 at close range.

@graph.name: Ninja
@graph.passive: Shadow Jutsu — On Dash, summon a Shadow Clone Companion for 8 seconds.

@graph.name: Necromancer
@graph.passive: Soul Reaper — Companions deal x1.01 Damage per Soul you have.

@graph.name: Paladin
@graph.passive: Crusader — Gain +15 to 30 Radiant damage. All radiant damage inflicts Glitter.

@graph.name: Mystic
@graph.passive: Enchanter — You gain +100% Stats from charms and Weapon Enchantments.

@graph.name: Soldier
@graph.passive: Preparation — Gain +20% Effect of Debuffs per Weapon Upgrade Level you have.

@graph.name: Samurai
@graph.passive: Ronin — Your Weapons inflict a stack of Retribution. Deals 60-115 Physical Damage. Inflicts Bleed.

@graph.name: Jester
@graph.passive: Deception — On Dash, your next 3 Attacks deal a guaranteed critical hit.

@graph.name: Beef
@graph.description: Gain +100% Stats from Strength. Strength grants more damage dealt, equip load capacity.

@graph.name: Barbarism
@graph.description: Each point of Strength grants more damage to STR-scaling weapons and equip load.

@graph.name: Battle Rush
@graph.description: Grants Power if you meet the breakpoint for STR scaling.

@graph.name: Adrenaline
@graph.description: Gain +1 missing Heart. Gain +25% Effect of Emotions per missing Heart.

@graph.name: Fire and Blood
@graph.description: You can stack Burn up to 3 times. Additional stacks refresh duration.

@graph.name: Alacrity
@graph.description: Grants +40% Attack Speed with Weapons that scale with Dexterity.

@graph.name: Electric City
@graph.description: Each stack of Shock additionally adds +25% Critical Hit Damage.

@graph.name: Deadly Toxins
@graph.description: Each stack of Poison additionally reduces enemy healing by 5%.

@graph.name: Chill Aura
@graph.description: Grants a Chill Aura that deals 40-70 Cold Damage 4 times per second and inflicts Chill.

@graph.name: Combustion
@graph.description: Burn deals increased damage. On tick, Burn has a chance to trigger an explosion.

@graph.name: Cold Blood
@graph.description: Chill additionally adds +20% chance to take a Critical Hit.

@graph.name: Burn Aura
@graph.description: Grants a Burn Aura that deals 15-45 Fire Damage 4 times per second and inflicts Burn.

@graph.name: Fiery
@graph.description: +20 to 35 Fire Damage

@graph.name: Icy
@graph.description: +20 to 30 Cold Damage

@graph.name: Electric
@graph.description: +5 to 75 Lightning Damage

@graph.name: Contaminated
@graph.description: +20 to 30 Poison Damage

@graph.name: Incinerating
@graph.description: x1.25 Burn Damage (requires Fire Damage on weapon)

@graph.name: Glacial
@graph.description: x1.25 Chill Effect (requires Cold Damage on weapon)

@graph.name: Charged
@graph.description: x1.25 Shock Effect (requires Lightning Damage on weapon)

@graph.name: Almighty
@graph.description: +30% Damage

@graph.name: Merciless
@graph.description: +125% Critical Hit Damage

@graph.name: Blazing
@graph.description: x2.00 Burn Damage (Dragon Trophy Room)
